name: Volo
description:
Volo is an independent software development company established in 2006 and headquartered in Yerevan, Armenia, with 7 development offices in Armenia and Ukraine. From day one, we put our software and mobile expertise to help leading companies and innovative startups from around the world create products that advance them further within their industries.
We develop advanced enterprise-grade backends (using Microsoft technologies) and set high standards for mobile application development. With over 160+ projects, our wide array of solutions help businesses step up their game in:
- Enterprise Software Development
- Mobile Application Development
- Next-Gen Engineering (AI/Machine Learning, Machine Vision, IoT)
- IT Management
- CyberSecurity
We have been building remarkable mobile apps with excellent suites of features and solutions that are enabling an unprecedented level of performance for an array of industries worldwide. We onboard professionals who share our values, are great team players, and abide by the principles of clean coding and agile workflows. 
Volo’s mobile division has been architecting and delivering dynamic, enterprise-grade mobile apps (native and cross-platform) that boast fast and responsive performances, a high degree of reliability, and a UI that delights users to enable precise performances.
